item.title: Power Automate Anaplan integration Part 1
item.description: Anaplan token To work with Anaplan, you first need to get an authorization token. Authorization documentation is described here. You can get a token in two ways: by passing a username and password, using certificates. The first method is not very suitable for building integration processes, so I used certificates that can be requested from Anaplan administratorsTo receive a token using a certificate, you need to send a request with parameters to the address https://auth.
